name: Animal Apocalypse
description:
Animal Apocalypse - game made for GMTK jam 2021. There're 3 levels(all of them are possible).  Use Q and E buttons to split and mix your characters. A, D and SPACE for movement.

Music: www.bensound.com

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1monFcyX1OupxJ-aMDiWlIdoslK-9ksHV
